title: 117 - LIVE Questions - Does God Cause Evil & Supporting a hateful president.
description:
LIVE Questions are back!

Does God cause pain? What do we do about this "hateful president". And aren't the righteous promised not to be shaken?

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
Music provided by Izzi Ray - http://www.soundcloud.com/izziray
